approaches.title: Thorough research
approaches.description: We normally spend at least two months researching each position we are working on. This is longer than most companies but we find it is the best way to turn up the best candidates.

approaches.title: No compromises
approaches.description: Although it seems old-fashioned, we know reading online CVs is no substitute for in-depth interviews. We never cut corners when looking for candidates or assessing their suitability.

approaches.title: Expertise
approaches.description: We only take on projects for charities and other mission-focused organisations, which means we have a focus and expertise in your field. You can trust us to know what is unique about recruitment in this sector and where to look to find the best people.

approaches.title: Creativity
approaches.description: People are not cogs in a machine and recruitment cannot be a box-ticking process. We work hard to be imaginative and go beyond the obvious solutions when conducting a search.

approaches.title: Shared vocation
approaches.description: We conduct searches for charities because we believe in what they do. You are not simply a client to us, but someone we are excited to partner with because we share your passion to make a difference.
